member.name: M:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartView.Print(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int32[],System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Double,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Prints the grid and/or chart.
member.param: The title to use for the temporary client window generated to support the print operation.
The temporary message to be displayed in the output window while the asynchronous print operation is in progress.
Determines whether the grid is printed; by default the value from the component instance settings is used.
Determines the columns to be printed, considering the specified array of column indexes in the columns collection; by default all displayed columns are printed.
Start date and time of the printed chart area; by default the value from the component instance settings is used.
Finish date and time of the printed chart area; by default the value from the component instance settings is used

Indicates the zoom level to be used for the printed chart area, and represents the actual number of device units each hour in the timeline gets available; to zoom in when printing, increase this value; to zoom out, decrease it; by default the value from the component instance settings is used.
Determines the first row to be printed, considering the specified index in the item collection; by default all rows, including those that are not currently visible in the viewport, are printed.
Determines the last row to be printed, considering the specified index in the item collection; by default all rows, including those that are not currently visible in the viewport, are printed.
Determines whether to rotate the exported content in order to simulate Landscape printing.
Determines whether to automatically close the temporary export output window generated for printing when the operation is completed.

member.summary: Exports the grid and/or chart content.
member.param: The client window name to export to; by default the content is exported to a new window ("_blank" target).
The title to use for the temporary client window generated to support the export operation.
The temporary message to be displayed in the output window while the asynchronous export operation is in progress.
Determines whether the grid is exported; by default the value from the component instance settings is used.
Determines the columns to be exported, considering the specified array of column indexes in the columns collection; by default all displayed columns are exported.
Start date and time of the exported chart area; by default the value from the component instance settings is used.
Finish date and time of the exported chart area; by default the value from the component instance settings is used

Indicates the zoom level to be used for the exported chart area, and represents the actual number of device units each hour in the timeline gets available; to zoom in when exporting, increase this value; to zoom out, decrease it; by default the value from the component instance settings is used.
Determines the first row to be exported, considering the specified index in the item collection; by default all rows, including those that are not currently visible in the viewport, are exported.
Determines the last row to be exported, considering the specified index in the item collection; by default all rows, including those that are not currently visible in the viewport, are exported.
Determines whether to rotate the exported content in the output document.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartView.ClientLibraryUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the external URL that holds the client JavaScript API (DlhSoft.ProjectData.GanttChart.HTML.Controls.js file) to be used internally by the control. If the URL is not set (as by default), the required JavaScript code is automatically injected into the output HTML page at runtime (once per page). You may use this property to increase the client-server communication performance in your Web application: add the DlhSoft.ProjectData.GanttChart.HTML.Controls.js file (from the installation folder of the product) into your Web project, and set the value of this property to the relative path it can be found at in your application.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the way selection is provided and behaves on client side for the control.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartView.IsAssignmentsContentReadOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the item assignments content is read only within the control. Set this property to true if you intend to display arbitrary markup as item assignments content within the grid; in this case it is strongly recommended to also set to false in order to remove the assumingly undesired simple text output from the chart area.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartView.IsTaskStartReadOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether task start values in the chart area of the control are read only.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartView.IsTaskEffortReadOnly

member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether task completion values in the chart area of the control are read only.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartView.AreTaskPredecessorsReadOnly

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartView.SplitterPositionChangeHandlerClientCode

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartView.HourWidthChangeHandlerClientCode

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartView.ItemPropertyChangeHandlerClientCode
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of JavaScript function body code statements (considering item, propertyName, isDirect, and isFinal parameters), to be executed immediately upon item property changes on the client side.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartView.ItemSelectionChangeHandlerClientCode
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of JavaScript function body code statements (considering item, isSelected, and isDirect parameters), to be executed immediately upon item selection changes on the client side.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartView.StyleDefinitionTemplateClientCode
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of JavaScript function body code statements (considering control parameter), returning SVG content to be included as style definitions for the chart (usually needed for dependency lines arrow marker customizations).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartView.StandardTaskTemplateClientCode
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of JavaScript function body code statements (considering control, and item parameters), returning SVG content to be presented for standard items in the chart (usually a task bar).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartView.SummaryTaskTemplateClientCode
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of JavaScript function body code statements (considering control, and item parameters), returning SVG content to be presented for summary items in the chart (usually a summary task polygon).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartView.MilestoneTaskTemplateClientCode
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of JavaScript function body code statements (considering control, and item parameters), returning SVG content to be presented for milestone items in the chart (usually a diamond shape).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartView.ExtraTaskTemplateClientCode
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of JavaScript function body code statements (considering control, and item parameters), returning extra SVG content to be presented for items in the chart.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartView.ItemTemplateClientCode
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of JavaScript function body code statements (considering control, and item parameters), returning SVG content to be presented for a specific item in the chart (usually a tool tip).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartView.AssignmentsTemplateClientCode
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of JavaScript function body code statements (considering control, and item parameters), returning extra SVG content to be presented as assignments content for items in the chart, to the right side of the task bars (usually a simple text referring the item assignments content).

member.summary: Gets or sets a set of JavaScript function body code statements (considering control, item, and predecessor item parameters), returning SVG content to be presented as dependency line for an item and a specified predecessor item in the chart, between a task and its predecessor (usually a polyline computed based on the dependency type, and the task and predecessor bar positions in the chart).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartView.PredecessorItemTemplateClientCode
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of JavaScript function body code statements (considering control, item, and predecessor item parameters), returning SVG content to be presented for an item and a specific predecessor item in the chart (usually a tool tip).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartView.AreTaskInterruptionsHighlighted

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartView.VisibilityFilterClientCode

member.name: F:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.PresentationTheme.ModernBordered

member.name: F:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.PresentationTheme.Aero

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartItem

member.summary: Initializes a new instance.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartItem.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets the object to be displayed to represent the task item in the grid and in task bar tool tips, usually the task name, or the task name and the assignment owner resource name. It is passed to the client side as the item.content field accessible from the client code (ToString method is used to convert the value).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartItem.Indentation
member.summary: Gets or sets the indentation level of the current item. The hierarchy is based on the indentation level values of the tasks, so that a task with a lower index in the collection and having a specific indentation level will become the parent task for the tasks with a higher index in the collection and having an increased indentation level. It is passed to the client side as the read only item.indentation field accessible from the client code.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartItem.IsExpanded
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the expansion state of the current item. If a parent task is expanded its child tasks become visible. If a parent task is collapsed its child tasks become invisible. It is passed to the client side as the internally managed item.isExpanded field accessible from the client code.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartItem.IsSelected
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the selection state of the current item. It is passed to the client side as the item.isSelected field accessible from the client code.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartItem.Start
member.summary: Gets or sets the start date and time value of the current item. It is passed to the client side as the item.start field accessible from the client code.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartItem.Finish
member.summary: Gets or sets the finish date and time value of the current item. It is passed to the client side as the item.finish field accessible from the client code.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartItem.CompletedFinish
member.summary: Gets or sets the completion finish date and time value (indicating the work progress) of the current item. It is passed to the client side as the item.completedFinish field accessible from the client code.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartItem.IsMilestone
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current item represents a milestone. A milestone task is displayed in the Gantt Chart view using a different task bar template It is passed to the client side as the item.isMilestone field accessible from the client code.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartItem.Schedule
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional object that defines the working week and day intervals and special nonworking days to consider for scheduling. It is passed to the client side as the read only item.schedule structure accessible from the client code. Server side scheduling functions ignore this property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartItem.AssignmentsContent
member.summary: Gets or sets the assignments content to be displayed in the Gantt Chart view next to the associated task bar, but it is not used internally for computing/updating task finish date and time (generating duration) based on any updated assignments. It is passed to the client side as the item.assignmentsContent field accessible from the client code (ToString method is used to convert the value).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.UI.WebControls.GanttChartItem.Predecessors
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection that defines predecessor items referring the task items that the current item depends of, and having the relations displayed in the Gantt Chart view as dependency lines, but it is not used internally for computing/updating task start and finish date and times (generating work time intervals) based on its defined dependencies. It is passed to the client side as the item.predecessors array accessible from the client code.
